full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement: Vehicle Towing and Recovery Services

### Solicitation Number
WS4466210611

### Publication Date
2024-02-29

### Tender Closing Date
2024-03-27, 14:00 EST

The Department of National Defence (DND), 39 Service Battalion (39 Svc Bn), requires vehicle towing and/or recovery services for registered DND vehicles throughout British Columbia, Canada, and Washington, USA.  Services will be needed on an “as and when requested” basis.

### Key Requirements and Deliverables
- Provide vehicle towing and/or recovery services as required throughout British Columbia, Canada, and Washington, USA
- Ensure services are provided in accordance with all applicable laws, regulations, and industry standards

### Contracting Entity Information
- Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5, Canada

### Contact Information
- Samantha Phelan (SPAC/PSPC)
samatha.phelan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Procedure for Obtaining the Solicitation Documents
Documentation is available via the linked URL [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18948133?extsite=MTg5NDgxMzNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18948133?extsite=MTg5NDgxMzNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

### Selection Criteria
- Lowest Price

### Trade Agreements
- Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

Note: This is a Request for Proposal (RFP) under the competitive open-bidding process. This government tender announcement details the key requirements and deliverables for vehicle towing and recovery services for registered DND vehicles.

The DND 39 Service Battalion (39 Svc Bn) is required to obtain these services within the provinces of British Columbia and Washington (USA) due to its extensive military operations in these regions. It must engage specialists who possess extensive expertise and the necessary resources. The competition will be based on a comparative analysis of the submissions received.\ The competition will result in an award of a contract, by a professional evaluation team who will select the “Lowest Price” bidder. \(clean enough?)
 

Finally, please consider how we may give users friendly URLs
